name: EventAttackEntity
description: This event is fired when the player attacks an entity by left-clicking it.
overview:
Backed by class `EventAttackEntity`.

### Behavior
* Fires when the player left-clicks an entity to attack it
* Only triggers for entities that can be attacked (living entities, players, etc.)
* Not cancellable

### Event payload
The event contains an `entity` field (Type: `EntityHelper`) representing the entity that was attacked.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The entity that was attacked by the player.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the event object.
